apps.name: Programming Hero
apps.description: Programming Hero is a fun and interactive way to learn programming. Whether you're a beginner or looking to brush up your skills, this app makes learning to code exciting and practical.

apps.name: Duolingo
apps.description: Learn over 30 languages with fun, bite-sized lessons on Duolingo.

apps.name: Khan Academy
apps.description: Khan Academy offers free lessons in math, science, coding, and more for learners of all ages.

apps.name: Coursera
apps.description: Learn new skills online from top universities and companies with Coursera.

apps.name: Udemy
apps.description: Access thousands of online courses on programming, business, design, and more.

apps.name: Brainly
apps.description: Brainly helps you get answers and explanations for homework questions.

apps.name: Notion
apps.description: Notion is an all-in-one workspace for note-taking, project management, and collaboration.

apps.name: Trello
apps.description: Trello lets you organize projects into boards, making collaboration simple and visual.

apps.name: Slack
apps.description: Slack is a messaging platform designed for team communication and collaboration.

apps.name: Evernote
apps.description: Capture ideas, organize notes, and access them anywhere with Evernote.

apps.name: Google Keep
apps.description: Capture notes, lists, and ideas quickly with Google Keep.

apps.name: Todoist
apps.description: Manage tasks, projects, and goals with Todoist.

apps.name: Asana
apps.description: Track work, manage projects, and collaborate with your team with Asana.

apps.name: Genshin Impact
apps.description: An open-world action RPG with beautiful visuals, elemental combat, and an immersive story.

apps.name: Minecraft
apps.description: Minecraft is a sandbox game where you can build anything you imagine, explore worlds, and survive monsters.

apps.name: Call of Duty: Mobile
apps.description: A fast-paced multiplayer FPS with iconic maps, modes, and battle royale.

apps.name: Chess.com
apps.description: Play chess online with millions of players worldwide or train with puzzles and lessons.

apps.name: PUBG Mobile
apps.description: Drop into the battleground, loot gear, and fight to be the last one standing in PUBG Mobile.

apps.name: Roblox
apps.description: A global platform for millions of user-generated games and experiences.

apps.name: Among Us
